subject: I will like to share this l
body:
I will like to share this little detail with you that would be of
mutual benefit to you and me. There's a DRC (Deposit Release
Case) which is open in a Security company vault because the owner
is now deceased and there's no clear next of kin to inherit or
clear the deposit.
As a stock consultant working with the Security Company, I
noticed that the deposit did not have proper details registered.
I propose that we work together to clear the deposit as I am very
sure it is a deposit with very high value because of the name of
the depositor.
This is totally 100% risk-free and would be mutually beneficial.
That's all the detail I can provide for now until I receive your
positive reply and I can explain further.
Regards,
Mr. Jones Jimmy Harra.
Send your reply to my private email 
harrajimmy6@gmail.com

subject: Re:    I will like to share this l
body:
Hello Mr. Jones Jimmy Harra,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. It sounds like a unique situation indeed. I'm curious to know more about this DRC Deposit Release Case, could you please elaborate on it? 

Also, as a stock consultant, how did you come across such a case? Is it common in your line of work?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Richard
